attributes.action: I would like to make British citizens aware that under 18 years of age can not vote but they can pay tax I feel that if you pay tax under the age of 18 years you should also have the right to vote as it is also where the under 18 years tax money is spent although this is a small percentage of people I feel that this is a strong subject and need answers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to make British citizens aware that under 18 years of age can not vote but they can pay tax I feel that if you pay tax under the age of 18 years you should also have the right to vote as it is also where the under 18 years tax money is spent although this is a small percentage of people I feel that this is a strong subject and need answers.

rejection.details: Please explain in your petition what action you would like the government to take.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
